contents.text: Thank you for calling Wonderware in San Francisco, the global leader in industrial automation software.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To learn about HMI and SCADA solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist in HMI and SCADA solutions.

navigationGoals: Get detailed specs and a quote for the HMI/SCADA software package.
I’m a former Navy technician and need detailed info on your HMI and SCADA solutions for my facility.
I need a breakdown of licensing options and feature capabilities for Wonderware HMI and SCADA deployments.
I’d like someone to explain which HMI and SCADA package I should buy and help me place an order
I need to speak with someone about comparing HMI and SCADA packages for real-time data display in my university lab.

contents.text: To discuss operations management and automation pricing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a pricing and operations management specialist.

navigationGoals: Inquire about pricing for operations management and automation solutions.
I’m a veteran operations manager looking for pricing details on your automation and operations management software.
I need detailed pricing for the Industrial Operations Management suite, including MES and automation modules.
I need pricing details for your operations management solution for a small facility
I’d like a detailed quote on the operations management add-on, including academic licensing fees.

contents.text: For technical support and service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Resolve a critical error in my Wonderware system with a support engineer.
I need technical support to troubleshoot connectivity issues with my SCADA system.
I’m troubleshooting an OPC UA communication failure between my SCADA system and PLC network.
I’m having trouble with my software screens not loading and need technical support to fix it
My SCADA system won’t connect to the PLC; I need help diagnosing and fixing the connection issue.

contents.text: For training, documentation, and customer success services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our training and customer success team.

navigationGoals: Arrange training and obtain documentation for the latest software features.
I want training materials and documentation to learn how to use your automation platform effectively.
I need advanced training materials and technical documentation for deploying Wonderware System Platform and Historian.
I want basic training and documentation to learn how to use the software step by step
I’d like to enroll in training and receive documentation on using Wonderware software for my research projects.
